item.description: Join Barbara Moura for a FREE intro to Auras and Chakras. What is an Aura and a Chakra you ask?? You’ll have to attend to find out! Come learn what Auras and Chakras are, how to use them and what they can tell you about yourself and others around you.  A series will follow with enough interest and will delve deeper into understanding our Auras and Chakras and will be sure to fun, interactive and eye opening!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: FREE Intro to Aura's & Chakras
